title: WPA2 Crack Enforcement
description:
An attacker cracked the Wi-Fi key using wordlists.

Objective: Simulate a WPA2 crack, then set a new 20-character PSK and rotate it.
dialogue: Mira: "We must ensure a strong passphrase and rotate it regularly."
Mira: "Can you help me test the Wi-Fi key and set a new one?"
hints: Use aircrack-ng against the handshake .cap file.
Use pwgen for generating strong passwords.
